          <title>
            <string language="en">The elements that make up ordinary salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Elemente, die gewöhnliches Salz bilden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les éléments qui composent le sel ordinaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os elementos que fazem acima o sal ordinário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli elementi che compongono il sale ordinario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα στοιχεία που αποτελούν το συνηθισμένο άλας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los elementos que hacen para arriba la sal 
ordinaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows sodium and chlorine as the chemical components of ordinary salt having different properties from salt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkali metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halogens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ordinary salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Natrium und Chlor als die 
chemischen Bestandteile des gewöhnlichen Salzes, das unterschiedliche
Eigenschaften vom Salz hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le sodium et le chlore 
comme composants chimiques du sel ordinaire ayant les propriétés 
différentes du sel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sodium e o cloro como 
os componentes químicos do sal ordinário que tem propriedades 
diferentes do sal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il sodio ed il cloro 
come i componenti chimici di sale ordinario che ha proprietà diverse 
da sale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το νάτριο και χλώριο ως 
χημικά συστατικά του συνηθισμένου άλατος που έχει τις 
διαφορετικές ιδιότητες από το άλας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el sodio y la clorina 
como los componentes químicos de la sal ordinaria que tiene diversas 
características de la sal.</string>
          </description>
